content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
MLB The Show 17 delivers the most realistic and personal baseball experience on consoles. This year, The Show offers exciting gameplay improvements and a greater ability to personalize your baseball experience.

It’s easy to love MLB The Show 17. With new missions, new modes, and so many new ways to play, there’s more opportunity for individuality than ever before.

Road To The Show
Write your own MLB superstar story in our RPG mode, featuring new opportunities to make decisions on and off the field that can change the path of your entire career.

Retro Mode
A retro-sim inspired gameplay experience that pays homage to the classic baseball games we all know and love.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Online features may be terminated at any time. ©2016 Sony Interactive Entertainment America LLC.
